mapper.insert: insert into Module (ModSn, UsgSn, UsrSn, LanSn, LicSn, ModName, ModID, IsOpenSrc, NeedWeb, CallOther, EnvType) values (#{modsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usgsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lansn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{licsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isopensrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{needweb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{callother,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{envtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update Module set UsgSn = #{usgsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UsrSn = #{usrsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LanSn = #{lansn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LicSn = #{licsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ModName = #{modname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ModID = #{modid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IsOpenSrc = #{isopensrc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NeedWeb = #{needweb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CallOther = #{callother,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EnvType = #{envtype,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ModSn = #{modsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ModSn, UsgSn, UsrSn, LanSn, LicSn, ModName, ModID, IsOpenSrc, NeedWeb, CallOther, EnvType from Module where ModSn = #{modsn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ModSn, UsgSn, UsrSn, LanSn, LicSn, ModName, ModID, IsOpenSrc, NeedWeb, CallOther, EnvType from Module
